name: echo-chamber
description: A magical number sequence prediction puzzle - Learn arithmetic progressions through an interactive fantasy-themed application

scripts.demo: node -e "const { EchoChamber } = require('./index.js'); const chamber = new EchoChamber(); const result = chamber.predictNext([3, 6, 9, 12]); console.log('Sample Sequence: [3, 6, 9, 12]'); console.log('Result:', result.nextNumber); console.log('Message:', result.message);"

author: CopilotAdventures Contributors
